item_prototype.name: CPU_[{#SNMPINDEX}]_状态
item_prototype.description: The working status of the CPU associated with the ID

item_prototype.name: h3cCPUHealthStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Health status of the CPU overall, normal(0), caution(1), warning(2), critical(3)

item_prototype.name: h3cDiskHealthStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Health status of the disk overall, normal(0), caution(1), warning(2), critical(3)

item_prototype.name: h3cEntiretyHealthStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: The entirety health status of this machine, normal(0), caution(1), warning(2), critical(3)

item_prototype.name: h3cFanHealthStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Health status of the FAN overall, normal(0), caution(1), warning(2), critical(3)

item_prototype.name: h3cMemHealthStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Health status of the memory overall, normal(0), caution(1), warning(2), critical(3)

item_prototype.name: h3cPwrHealthStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Health status of the power supply overall, normal(0), caution(1), warning(2), critical(3)

item_prototype.name: h3cTempHealthStatus[{#SNMPINDEX}]
item_prototype.description: Health status of the temprature overall, normal(0), caution(1), warning(2), critical(3)

item_prototype.name: Power_[{#SNMPINDEX}]_当前状态
item_prototype.description: The present status of power supply , absence(0), presence(1)

item_prototype.name: Power_[{#SNMPINDEX}]_Cost
item_prototype.description: Information about the cost of power. The unit is watt.

item_prototype.name: TempSensor_[{#SNMPINDEX}]_Reading
item_prototype.description: Information about temperature reading, the unit is degree C.
